did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Printed materials, publications, drawings, prints, sketches, and reports.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes published articles on city planning and landscape architecture; printer's proofs and a published copy of THE HISTORY OF CITY PLANNING; drawings, prints, and sketches; reports; graduation program and oration by Hugo-Brunt, article by Hugo-Brunt; and graduation program, University of Cape Town (South Africa).

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Michael Hugo Brunt was an architecture professor at Cornell University before moving to the School of Architecture of the University of Western Australia. Member, International Fraternity of Lambda Alpha, Simcoe Chapter.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes published articles on city planning and landscape architecture; printer's proofs and a published copy of THE HISTORY OF CITY PLANNING; drawings, prints, and sketches; reports; graduation program and oration by Hugo-Brunt, University of Western Australia; University of Western Australia UNIVERSITY NEWS with an article by Hugo-Brunt; and graduation program, University of Cape Town (South Africa).

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: University of Western Australia. School of Architecture.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Michael Hugo-Brunt Papers, #15-2-1338. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

odd.head: NOTES
odd.p: Part of Lambda Alpha Literary Archives.
